---
id: purchase
title: "Purchase A Mod (External)"
description: "Purchase a mod. A successful request will return the newly created [Pay Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/pay-object). Please note that different properties will be required in the request body based on the `X-Modio-Portal` header provided and the checkout `type`. For example, if `X-Modio-Portal` is set to `xboxlive` and the checkout `type` is set to `1`, then the `xbox_token` property must be provided in the request body."
sidebar_label: "Purchase A Mod (External)"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: restapi/docs/mod-io-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Purchase A Mod (External)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}/checkout"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Purchase a mod. A successful request will return the newly created [Pay Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/pay-object). Please note that different properties will be required in the request body based on the `X-Modio-Portal` header provided and the checkout `type`. For example, if `X-Modio-Portal` is set to `xboxlive` and the checkout `type` is set to `1`, then the `xbox_token` property must be provided in the request body.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"X-Modio-Portal","in":"header","description":"[The target portal for the request.](/restapi/platforms#targeting-a-portal) Supported values currently include `steam`, `xboxlive`, `psn` and `epicgames`.","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"X-Modio-Platform","in":"header","description":"[The specific platform to target.](/restapi/platforms#targeting-a-platform) Required when portal is set to `psn`.","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Purchase A Mod (External) Request","required":["idempotent_key","type"],"properties":{"display_amount":{"description":"The amount/price that was displayed to the user. Only required for virtual token checkouts.","type":"integer","format":"int32"},"idempotent_key":{"description":"The use of the idempotency key is for if in the event of a connection error, you can confidently reattempt the request without the concern of inadvertently creating a duplicate purchase or executing the purchase twice. All idempotent keys last 24 hours.","type":"string"},"type":{"description":"0 - Virtual token checkout, 1 - Sku checkout, 2 - Unified checkout (intent + commit in one call), 3 - Unified intent (returns tax info), 4 - Unified commit (completes purchase after intent)","type":"integer","format":"int32"},"subscribe":{"description":"Optional boolean to subscribe to the mod when purchasing. Default is true.","type":"boolean","default":false},"psn_token":{"description":"The auth code returned from the PlayStation™Network API.","type":"string","example":"v3.AbCdE"},"psn_env":{"description":"The PlayStation™Network environment you are targeting. If omitted, the request will default to targeting the production environment.","type":"integer","example":256},"psn_service_label":{"description":"The service label where the entitlements for mod.io reside. If omitted the default value will be 0.","type":"integer","example":0},"xbox_token":{"description":"The Xbox Live token returned from calling [GetTokenAndSignatureAsync(\"\"POST\"\", \"\"https://api.mod.io\"\")](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/microsoft.xbox.services.system.xboxliveuser.gettokenandsignatureasync?view=xboxlive-dotnet-2017.11.20171204.01). <br /><br />__NOTE:__ Due to the encrypted app ticket containing special characters, you must URL encode the string before sending the request to ensure it is successfully sent to our servers otherwise you may encounter an `422 Unprocessable Entity` response. For example, [cURL](https://ec.haxx.se/http-post.html) will do this for you by using the `--data-urlencode` option.","type":"string","example":"XBL3.0 x=9264027439329321064;eym72VygeZzTSUVRmNvw8v..."},"epicgames_token":{"description":"The bearer token which can act on behalf of the user. Refer to [\"requesting an access token\"](https://dev.epicgames.com/docs/web-api-ref/authentication#requesting-an-access-token) in the Epic Games documentation.","type":"string","example":"eyJraWQiOiJWbWdpMDFoQ..."},"epicgames_sandbox_id":{"description":"The environment to target. Refer to [\"what is a sandbox?\"](https://dev.epicgames.com/docs/dev-portal/product-management#what-is-a-sandbox) in the Epic Games documentation.","type":"string","example":"p-k3t9v0mdqzgsx4hpl8w2nfc5ry7bj4"},"payment_method_id":{"description":"The payment method ID (UUID) to use for the purchase. Required for unified checkout types (2, 3).","type":"string"},"terms_accepted":{"description":"Whether the user has accepted the terms and conditions. Required for unified checkout types (2, 3).","type":"boolean"},"refund_accepted":{"description":"Whether the user has accepted the refund policy. Required for unified checkout types (2, 3).","type":"boolean"},"transaction_id":{"description":"The transaction ID returned from the unified intent step. Required for unified commit checkout (type 4).","type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

score.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":91},"ratings_weighted_aggregate":{"description":"Overall rating of this item calculated using the Wilson score confidence interval. This column is good to sort on, as it will order items based on number of ratings and will place items with many positive ratings above those with a higher score but fewer ratings.","type":"number","format":"float","example":87.38},"ratings_display_text":{"description":"Textual representation of the rating in format.","type":"string","enum":["Overwhelmingly Positive","Very Positive","Positive","Mostly Positive","Mixed","Negative","Mostly Negative","Very Negative","Overwhelmingly Negative","Unrated"],"example":"Very Positive"},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp until this mods's statistics are considered stale.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1492564103}},"type":"object"},"skus":{"description":"SKUs with corresponding platforms that can be used to purchase the mod.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Mod SKU Object","properties":{"id":{"description":"The unique identifier for the SKU object.","type":"integer"},"sku":{"description":"The SKU for the mod at the given portal.","type":"string"},"portal":{"description":"The store (or platform) where the SKU is available.","type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}}},"400":{"description":"The authenticated user is already subscribed to the mod.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","description":"Standard API error response.","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/introduction#response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object.
